headline: Progressive EPS Outlook Raised; KBW Keeps Market Perform Rating
summary: The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) ranks among the best fundamental stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 20, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods reaffirmed its Market Perform rating for The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR), citing a $288 price target. The research firm boosted its earnings per share estimates for 2025 and 2026 from $15.25 and $14.65 […]
